data.name: BIOMUTANT - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The atmospheric Soundtrack to BIOMUTANT features 16 high quality tracks for a total of over 30 minutes of music, composed by Björn Palmberg.
data.about_the_game: The atmospheric Soundtrack to BIOMUTANT features 16 high quality tracks for a total of over 30 minutes of music, composed by Björn Palmberg.
data.short_description: The atmospheric Soundtrack to BIOMUTANT features 16 high quality tracks for a total of over 30 minutes of music, composed by Björn Palmberg.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 65 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 380 MB available space
